material_number.description: Unique identifier assigned to each SKU

material_description.description: Full SKU name of the product

brand_variant.description: Specific variant name of the brand under which the material is sold

brand.description: Primary brand associated with the material (e.g., HERO, HONDA, ISUZU, KOBELCO, KOMATSU)

sub_pack.description: Pack size value of a single unit

base_unit_of_measure.description: Unit of measurement for the material [EA, KG, L]

company_group.description: Company group under which the material is classified [ENTI, TWOC]

segment_order.description: Segment in which the material falls in [AGRI, BASE OIL, CVO, DEF, ENEOS, GEAR OILS, GENUINE OILS, GREASES, INDUSTRIAL, MCO, OTHERS, PCMO, SCRAP, SCV, UTTO, VEHICLE CARE]

pack_type.description: Classification of packaging based on size [SMALL, BULK]

product_vertical.description: Business-level product vertical in which the material falls in [AUTOMOTIVE, BASE OIL, DEF, ENEOS, ENEOS GO, INDUSTRIAL, SCRAP, VEEDOL GO, VEHICLE CARE]

product_category.description: Sub-portfolio classification under Product Vertical [BASE OIL, DEF, ENEOS, ENEOS GO, PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM, PROFESSIONAL, SCRAP, VEEDOL GO]
